Игра очень затягивающая,в ней прекрасны как сама задумка, так и мелкие детали (шорканья, звуки, мелодии при взаимодействии с предметами). Сами головоломки по уровню сложности не легкие, но и не черезвычайно сложные, в некоторых местах прийдется остановится на минут 15.  В игре присутсвует мультиплеер по сети.

Que jogo espetacular, apenas extraordinario amigos, que jogo lindo, uma história que parece besta e sem sentido se torna algo tão magnifico você se apaixona por todos os personagens o vilão com o seu sarcasmo o seu personagem mesmo sendo muda, você se apega a ela e acaba a querer o mesmo que ela, tudo nesse jogo é belo, que jogo bom eu recomendo a todos esse jogo é simplesmente perfeito. Como o jogo lida com a jogabilidade de puzzles dificeis que você fica horas pra passar, a história te prende e você só consegue sair quando você zera, e a satisfação de zerar o jogo e ver o seu personagem conseguindo oque tanto almejava desde o primeiro jogo é simplesmente gratificante

REQUIREMNTS:
NEED MASSIVE 1 MILLION IQ BIG BRAIN

PROBLEMS YOU MAY FACE:
WANT TO QUIT
SCREAMING WITH RAGE CAUSE OF HOW GOD DAMN DIFFICULT IT IS

Very good story that ties very well into the first game. Unlike the first installment, this one had a more direct story and chapters that guide you through its story. One thing I do miss from the original game however is the saving system. This game only gave you five updating save slots while the first game gave you so many more. I know it's a small complaint but I often got annoyed when I wanted to go back to a specific point in my playthrough and I couldn't because it was removed from the low save storage. Overall, its a very good game that is loads more polished than its predecessor. I can definitely see myself coming back to it.

one of my favorite games of all time, eternal classic

Amazing sequel. The story is very well told and is honestly a masterpiece. For a game published in 2011 it still has a very appealing and easy on the eyes graphics, especially for those who played Valve games in the last two decades. The puzzles are naturally harder than in Portal 1, levels have more "mechanics" and are all around a bit more challenging. Voice acting is again amazing and  hilarious. Character development and world building/expansion is noticeable and very immersive.

The game is a masterpiece and worth every euro, dollar or pound you pay for it!
